extDescription.message: LayerCraft lets you easily modify web page text and replace images, just like using magic stickers. It supports one-click undo and screenshot sharing. It's a web editor that's easy to use even without programming skills.

main.elementSelectTips: Click the button below to select an element on the page to modify
main.unableSelectElement: Cannot operate on elements of the current page. This may be due to it being a new tab page or a browser-privileged page.
